fields.headline: How to DIY it
fields.bodyText: Holiday auctions The residents of the Isle of Mull fancy a new swimming pool. To help raise the money, a group of them have got together to organise a collective auction on eBay. Sandwiched between a pair of clogs and a signed photo of Prunella Scales, you'll find a listing for the rental of one of the island's lovely cottages for three nights this Christmas. The Mull sale (go to ebay.co.uk, type in "pooltogether") is a tad unusual, but it is part of wider trend towards buying holidays on online auction sites. Holidays have been for sale on eBay for ages, but the introduction of specialist sites has recently upped the bidding. Package holiday veteran Thompson has entered the fray with its own online auction site (thomsonauctions.co.uk).
